head.title: Embed barcodes in {{FileFormatUp}} files with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API makes it simple to create and insert barcode images into your documents and emails in real time.

header.title: Generate barcodes for {{FileFormatUp}} files with our .NET API
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides comprehensive tools to dynamically create, customize, and embed barcodes into {{FileFormatUp}} files using the {{ProgLang}} API.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) helps you generate and customize documents by adding data from multiple sources. Easily insert text, numbers, charts, tables, lists, images, and barcodes. Use advanced templates to ensure the data appears exactly where you want it. Supports over 50 formats, including PDF, Office files, and emails.

more_features.title: Build documents using data-powered templates
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies document creation across popular file types. Use templates to add charts, tables, lists, links, images, and barcodes seamlessly.

feature_1.title: Generate reports using business data
feature_1.content: The API populates documents with data from formats like JSON, XML, and CSV efficiently and accurately.

feature_2.title: Visualize data with built-in elements
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} supports native elements like tables, charts, and lists, along with text, links, images, and real-time barcode generation.

feature_3.title: Insert data where you need it
feature_3.content: With LINQ-based templates, you can place data precisely, use loops to add arrays, and customize formatting such as color programmatically.

feature_4.title: Wide compatibility with file types
feature_4.content: Handle files like MS Office documents, PDFs, HTML, OpenOffice, and emails. You can also merge one document into another.

formats.title: Create reports in various formats
formats.description: {{EnvName}} supports over 50 file types, enabling effortless data merging and template processing for professional results.

operations.title: Discover key features
operations.description: Our platform simplifies handling business documents with powerful tools and automation.

examples.comment_1: Use this tag in your template to create a barcode in the output document
examples.comment_2: Set the file path for the template
examples.comment_4: Save the updated document with the barcode

steps.title: How to embed a barcode in a {{FileFormatUp}} document

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) lets you insert barcodes into popular formats like {{FileFormatUp}} templates. Supports over 60 types, including 1D and 2D barcodes.
content.step_1: Set up a {{FileFormatUp}} template with barcode markers.
content.step_2: Fetch data from a supported source.
content.step_3: Adjust barcode settings such as size and resolution.
content.step_4: Save the document with the embedded barcode.

code_1.title: How to create a barcode dynamically
code_1.content: This example shows how to dynamically generate and add a barcode to a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Prepare a template with a barcode placeholder
code_1.comment_2: Set the path to your template file
code_1.comment_3: Load data from a specific source
code_1.comment_4: Build a data source object with the necessary data
code_1.comment_7: Save the updated document with the barcode
